body_html: @neerajprad Calling .contiguous() will probably not satisfy the objective of this PR, because of the fact that .contiguous() creates a contiguous copy of the tensor, meaning more memory allocation, which is not intended if I understand correctly.
body_text: @neerajprad Calling .contiguous() will probably not satisfy the objective of this PR, because of the fact that .contiguous() creates a contiguous copy of the tensor, meaning more memory allocation, which is not intended if I understand correctly.
body: @neerajprad Calling `.contiguous()` will probably not satisfy the objective of this PR, because of the fact that `.contiguous()` creates a contiguous copy of the tensor, meaning more memory allocation, which is not intended if I understand correctly.
